document_data.name: Fatima Kossi
document_data.mainbody: '''Fatima Kossi''' was a [[halfling]] who lived in the [[Pilgrims' District]] of [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/City of Delights/Gem of Zakhara|59}}
document_data.Activities:
Fatima owned the [[Wanderer's Rest]], catering to [[pilgrim]]s visiting Huzuz. She often let true pilgrims stay for free if they could not afford her rates.

Fatima was a devout follower of [[Kor]]. She felt like she wasted much of her life in pursuit of money when she could have spent that time productively as a priestess.
document_data.History: Though long retired, Fatima used to be an adventurer.
